dob-day.required: Date of birth must include a day
dob-day.invalid: Date of birth must be a real date

dob-month.required: Date of birth must include a month
dob-month.invalid: Date of birth must be a real date

dob-year.required: Date of birth must include a year
dob-year.invalid: Date of birth must be a real date

dob-day-month.required: Date of birth must include a day and month

dob-month-year.required: Date of birth must include a month and year

dob-day-year.required: Date of birth must include a day and year

dob-date.invalid: Date of birth must be a real date
dob-date.dateInFuture: Date of birth must be in the past
dob-date.dodBeforeDob: Enter a date of birth that is before the date of death
